backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required Final Page button behavior and associated files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing high‑level summaries for all frontend pages and core components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app root and entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router and all 10 site routes wrapped in the LoveSiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/animations/Celeb: Full‑screen celebration overlay showing animated heart graphics when enabled.
frontend/src/components/animations/Float: Displays drifting floating heart emojis for decorative page backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/animations/Heart: Renders small pulsing heart emojis around content for accent decoration.
frontend/src/components/animations/PageF: Simple wrapper applying fade‑in animation to page content.
frontend/src/components/animations/Spark: Overlay rendering animated sparkle emojis across the screen.
frontend/src/components/LoveSiteLayout.t: Layout providing navigation header/footer, side menu, background pattern, and music controls.
frontend/src/components/music/MusicContr: UI buttons for play/pause and mute controls using the MusicProvider context.
frontend/src/components/music/MusicProvi: Context managing background music playback, mute state, and persistence via sessionStorage.
frontend/src/components/RomanticButton.t: Wrapper around UI Button adding custom romantic styling variants and animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useRunawayButton.ts: Implements logic for a button that moves away from the pointer within a container, updating its position based on mouse or touch proximity.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, custom color tokens, Tailwind layers, and utility classes for a romantic-themed UI.
frontend/src/lib/lovePages.ts: Stores metadata for sequential love‑themed pages and provides helpers to navigate between them.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/01-Home.tsx: Displays the homepage with animated hearts, themed text, and a button that navigates to the first story page.
frontend/src/pages/02-TheFirstMoment.tsx: Renders a page describing the first meaningful moment, with sparkles and styled romantic text.
frontend/src/pages/03-HowIFellForYou.tsx: Shows a themed page explaining how the narrator fell in love, using soft gradients and styled text.
frontend/src/pages/04-YourKindness.tsx: Presents a page focused on praising the recipient’s kindness with romantic styling.
frontend/src/pages/05-TheLittleThings.ts: Displays a page highlighting small beloved traits, including animated heart accents.
frontend/src/pages/06-WhenIRealizedItWas: Shows a page describing the moment the narrator realized their feelings were love.
frontend/src/pages/07-WhatYouMeanToMe.ts: Renders a page expressing the emotional significance of the recipient with soft gradient visuals.
frontend/src/pages/08-MyTrueConfession.t: Romantic page displaying affectionate messages with pastel styling and fade‑in animation.
frontend/src/pages/09-MyPromiseToYou.tsx: Page presenting heartfelt promises with soft gradients and simple fade‑in layout.
frontend/src/pages/10-FinalPage.tsx: Interactive final page asking a question with Yes/Think/No buttons, state handling, and celebration animation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugins for the romantic theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the 10‑page romantic site, features, requirements, and known issues.
